TopicTitle: First time post with an idea

Articles.Content: Hello all, first time poster here with a thank you to the developers and a thank you to all the helpful people on the board. I have a suggestion for something to be added to the game and I hope this is the right place to to throw it out there but I think it would be nice to have a balance or center of gravity indicator for the space plane. I have a hard time finding the sweetspot when Im designing them and think that some kind of indicator would help speed up the process.
That\'s planned for 0.17, and this post belongs in the suggestions sub-forum of the Development forum.

Hi carbinedc and welcome to the community

The center of gravity indicator is a planned feature of the next major update, as is a center of thrust and mass indicator.

Also, there is a suggestions board for peoples ideas, I\'ll grab the links for you in a sec.
